products.title: Products
products.subtitle: Manage your product catalog
products.searchPlaceholder: Search by barcode, name, or SKU...
products.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
products.importComplete: Import complete: {{imported}} imported, {{updated}} updated, {{skipped}} skipped, {{failed}} failed
products.enterProductDetails: Enter the product details. Use a barcode scanner for quick entry.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.subtitle: Scan waybills and product barcodes for packaging records
packaging.scanToCreate: Scan a waybill to create one
packaging.pressEnterToSubmit: Press Enter to submit the record
packaging.deleteRecordMessage: Are you sure you want to delete waybill "{{waybill}}"? This will also delete all {{count}} scanned items. This action cannot be undone.
packaging.productNotFoundMessage: The product with barcode "{{barcode}}" does not exist in the database. Please scan a valid product barcode.
packaging.waybillExistsMessage: The waybill "{{waybill}}" already exists for today. Please enter a different waybill number.
packaging.scanAtLeastOne: Please scan at least one product

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Generate and export packaging reports
reports.exportDescription: Export packaging records for a date range
reports.dateError: Start date must be before or equal to end date
reports.selectDatesError: Please select both start and end dates
reports.noRecordsError: No records found for the selected date range

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Enter your email and password to access your account
login.activeSessionMessage: You already have an active session. Would you like to revoke the current session and log in with these credentials?

productForm.selectBundleProducts: Select products to include in this bundle.
productForm.bundleRequired: Bundle must have at least one product
